name: ai-chatbot-saas
description: SaaS platform for creating custom AI chatbots

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:ai-service && npm run install:widget
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai-service"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:ai-service && npm run build:widget
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
